description:
**Tool Overview**:
This is a built-in feature of Microsoft Edge that allows users to check the current version of their browser. **How to Use**:
1. Open your Microsoft Edge browser.
2. Click on the three dots (`...`) located at the far right side of the window.
3. Navigate to **Help and Feedback**.
4. Click on **About Microsoft Edge**. This action will display the version information of Microsoft Edge.

**Details**:
This tool is essential for ensuring that users are running the latest version of the browser, which addresses various security vulnerabilities, including those related to CVE-2024-0519. By keeping the browser updated, you can minimize the risk of exploitation from known vulnerabilities that may be present in older versions.
